mapper.select: SELECT id, `name`, `group`, address, phone, time FROM group_hotel WHERE `group` = #{group} AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY update_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_hotel ( id, `group`, name, address, time, phone, create_by, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{group}, #{name}, #{address}, #{time}, #{phone}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE group_hotel SET name = #{name}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, time = #{time}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
